metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3105 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The convert extension in Mercurial before 3.8 might allow context-dependentattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted git repository name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 3.9.1-1
mercurial-common - 3.9.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mercurial package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.9.1-1').
